# FUNCTIONS
```{r define-functions}
plot_gep_rank <- function(cnmf_df=cnmf_spectra, genes_to_highlight){
  plist <- list()
  for(gp in paste0("GEP", 3:6)){
    # print(gp)
    df <- NULL
    df <- cnmf_df %>%
      t() %>%
      as.data.frame() %>%
      rownames_to_column("gene") %>%
      pivot_longer(cols = !gene,
                   names_to = "gep",
                   values_to = "value") %>%
      filter(gep == gp) %>%
      mutate(rank = dense_rank(-value))
    
    p <- ggplot(df, aes(x = rank, y = value)) +
      geom_hline(yintercept = 0, linetype = "dashed", color="grey") +
      geom_point(size = 0.5) +
      geom_label_repel(
        data = df %>% filter(gene %in% genes_to_highlight),
        aes(label = gene),
        # nudge_y = 0.001,
        nudge_x = -1000,
        min.segment.length = 0,
        force = 10,
        force_pull = 0.01,
        max.time=2,
        max.overlaps = Inf
      ) +
      labs(x = "rank", y = "regression coefficient", title = gp) +
      ylim(c(-0.002, 0.0027)) +
      scale_x_continuous(expand=expansion(mult=0.2))+
      theme_classic() +
      theme(panel.border = element_rect(fill = NA),
            axis.line = element_blank())
    p <- ggrastr::rasterise(p, layers="Point", dpi=300)
    plist[[gp]] <- p
  }
  
  pcombined <- plot_grid(plotlist = plist, nrow=1)
  
  return(pcombined)
}
```
